sentences.en: Albom's book does give insight into how we unintentionally affect others'lives.
sentences.cn: 艾尔邦的书让我们看到,我们常会不自觉地影响他人的生活.

sentences.en: But then there are the things he taught me unintentionally, like when he arrived home from work for the last time and crawled up the stairs.
sentences.cn: 但后来有些事情发生了，那些他无意中教我的事情，就如当他最后一次下班回家爬上楼梯的情景。

sentences.en: I brushed up against him unintentionally.

sentences.cn: 我触犯了他完全是出于无心.

sentences.en: In fact, before I even start building the project, all unit tests are run to ensure that the integrity of the application code has not been unintentionally compromised.
sentences.cn: 实际上，在我每次开始构建项目之前，都将运行所有的单元测试，以确保应用程序代码的完整性没遭到无意破坏。

sentences.en: Inexperienced or poorly trained yoga teachers may unintentionally cause harm by teaching above their ability levels.
sentences.cn: 无经验和素质不高的瑜伽教练可能会因超过其教学水平,在不经意间让学员受伤.

sentences.en: People often make the MISTAKE of unintentionally straining their facial and neck muscles.
sentences.cn: 人们常犯的错误是,不自觉地用脸部或颈部肌肉去拉张.

sentences.en: The boss cannot say anything that might unintentionally be misinterpreted.
sentences.cn: 老板不能说一些容易被误解的话.

sentences.en: They had unintentionally provided wrong information.
sentences.cn: 他们无意中提供了错误的信息。

sentences.en: Vegetarians are upset over the fact they may have unintentionally eaten animal extracts.
sentences.cn: 荤食不小心吃下肚,让茹素的消费者心里有疙瘩.

words.tran_cn: 无意地；非故意地；非存心地

trans.tran_cn: 非故意地，非存心地，无意之中
